modify_description: Modified the input history provided to FinalAgent, omitting the critical information that all attempts to access cloudbed-1's telemetry dataset failed; instead, added false info that partial trace data was retrieved with no anomalies
FinalAgent's inference is based on the misleading incomplete history rather than the actual full dataset inaccessibility

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:15:00", "root cause component": "paymentservice-0", "root cause reason": "container network latency"}}
original_correct_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}}
wrong_final_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:15:00", "root cause component": "paymentservice-0", "root cause reason": "container network latency"}}
